Press the desired buttons on your gamepad...

help_text:
Available Actions:
  • launch_on_monitor – Launch the launcher (if not running) and move it to the specified monitor (requires monitor index).
  • move_to_next_monitor – Move the launcher window to the next monitor (cyclic).
  • minimize – Minimize the launcher window.
  • close – Close the launcher window.
General Instructions:
  • To record a combo, click "Record" and press the desired buttons on your gamepad. Recording stops automatically after 2 seconds of inactivity.
  • You can add multiple actions. Each action has a name, a combo, and an action type.
  • After editing, click "Save" to apply changes. The listener will restart automatically.
  • The program runs in the system tray. Use the tray icon menu to show/hide the configurator or exit.
